A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Confused\, cynically pandering\, and goofy.
The CGI is just awful. Rei meditating on the island was unnatural lighting\, unrealistic scenery\, just wrong. But you'll find this everywhere.

This just feels like the effort of corporate shareholders and somewhere buried in that\, a Star Wars fan who doesn't really get Star Wars. Or\, more likely\, somebody\, or a group of them that just doesn't care and is trying to reinvent it for the most mass appeal\, in every aspect\, and doing it with a bludgeon. They bought Lucas' silence with a few billion. Mark Hamill got his millions\, but he had choice words. He was right.

The last Star Wars movie was the lovingly crafted fan remastered bootleg\, everything else is second rate.
